lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

You are starving, and the cafeteria line seems to be moving very slowly. Today's menu includes: meatballs (breadballs), pizza (cardboard), and chicken (mystery of the unknown meat) pies. About the only things edible seem to be the French
fries and the white powdered donuts.
You take a portion of fries, but by the time you get to the cash register, you have already finished them. You can:
#KEEP WALKING THROUGH AND SAY THAT YOU HAVE DECIDED TO SKIP LUNCH
Hah! Do you think Maxine, the cafeteria lady, was born yesterday? She can smell "French-fry breath" from two hundred yards. She makes you pay.
It's a good thing you didn't try to sneak through. Maxine, the cafeteria lady, can smell "French-fry breath" from two hundred yards away.
